DOC.brief_summary: Patients triple negative metastatic breast cancer ( HER2- , PR- , ER- ) receive bevacizumab , paclitaxel capecitabine first line treatment ( possibility receive adjuvant chemotherapy ) .
DOC.brief_title: Bevacizumab + Paclitaxel + Capecitabine Triple Negative Metastatic Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Female histologically confirm adenocarcinoma breast ER , PR , HER2 disease Measurable disease Patients may receive prior radiotherapy adjuvant treatment or/and metastatic disease provide progressive disease study entry Prior chemotherapy metastatic disease HER2 positive and/or hormonal receptor positive
